results.title: Cardioprotective Effects of Mebudipine in a Rat Model of Doxorubicin-Induced Heart Failure
results.text_hl: The administration of CCBs, except for @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, should be avoided in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@congestive HF@@@.

results.title: Acute High-Output Heart Failure with Pulmonary Hypertension and Severe Liver Injury Caused by Amlodipine Poisoning: A Case Report.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@Acute high-output heart failure@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HOHF@@@) with @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@ caused by @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ @DISEASE_Poisoning @DISEASE_MESH:D011041 @@@poisoning@@@ is very rare.

results.title: Efficacy of methylene blue in a murine model of amlodipine overdose.
results.text_hl: DISCUSSION: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ dose induced @DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxicity@@@ that were effects were more pronounced in the untreated group. 50% vehicle controls quickly progressed into @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ (within 90 min of exposure) and did not survive the two h observation endpoint.

citations.NLM: de Castro Brás LE, Baccanale CL, Eccleston L, Sloan T, St Antoine JC, Verzwyvelt SM, Pittman P, O'Rourke D, Meggs WJ. Efficacy of methylene blue in a murine model of amlodipine overdose. Am J Emerg Med. 2021 Jul;45():284-289. PMID: 33041135

results.title: A Long-Term Survivor With Alveolar Capillary Dysplasia
results.text_hl: In combination with other agents, endothelin receptor antagonists and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ have been key medications in lowering pulmonary arterial pressure and managing @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@right heart failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Yost CE, Putnam AR, Dishop MK, Jorgensen LO, Wirkus PE, Day RW. A Long-Term Survivor With Alveolar Capillary Dysplasia JACC Case Rep. 2020 Aug;2(10):1492-1495. PMID: 34317003

results.title: Prevention of Heart Failure in Hypertension - the Role of Coronary Heart Disease Events Treated with Versus without Revascularization: the ALLHAT Study.
results.text_hl: The proportion of reference interaction indicating direct harm due to CHD event for @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (234% for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@; 355% for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HHF@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (244% for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@; 468% for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HHF@@@) was greater than for @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@ (143% for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@; 269% for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HHF@@@).

citations.NLM: Chen V, Davis BR, Kapadia SR, Kattan MW, Tereshchenko LG. Prevention of Heart Failure in Hypertension - the Role of Coronary Heart Disease Events Treated with Versus without Revascularization: the ALLHAT Study. Am J Cardiol. 2024 Sep 5;():. PMID: 39243877

results.title: Veno-arterial ECMO support for severe amlodipine toxicity combined with cardiogenic shock: A case report.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was weaned off ECMO after 4 days and discharged home on Day 10 of hospitalization. CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ can result in severe @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@cardiac failure@@@ with @DISEASE_Shock @DISEASE_MESH:D012769 @@@circulatory collapse@@@.

citations.NLM: Sun Y, Wang T, Xia J, Hua L, Cao S, Zhang K. Veno-arterial ECMO support for severe amlodipine toxicity combined with cardiogenic shock: A case report. Int J Artif Organs. 2025 Feb 24;():3913988251321620. PMID: 39989148

results.title: The First Dedicated Comprehensive Heart Failure Program in the United States: The Division of Circulatory Physiology at Columbia Presbyterian (1992-2004).
results.text_hl: The major research achievements of the division included (1) the development of beta-blockers for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, from initial hemodynamic assessments to proof-of-concept studies to large-scale international trials; (2) the development and definitive assessment of @CHEMICAL_flosequinan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C047316 @@@flosequinan@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, and endothelin antagonists; (3) initial clinical trials and concerns with nesiritide; (4) large-scale trials evaluating dosing of angiotensin converting-enzyme inhibitors and the efficacy and safety of @GENE_MME @GENE_4311 @@@neprilysin@@@ inhibition; (5) identification of key mechanisms in @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, including neurohormonal activation, microcirculatory endothelial dysfunction, deficiencies in peripheral vasodilator pathways, noncardiac factors in driving @DISEASE_Dyspnea @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@, and the first identification of subphenotypes of @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ and a preserved ejection fraction; (6) the development of a volumetric approach to the assessment of myocardial shortening; (7) conceptualization and early studies of cardiac contractility modulation as a treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@; (8) novel approaches to the identification of cardiac allograft rejection and new therapeutics to prevent @DISEASE_Bronchiolitis_Obliterans_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D000092122 @@@allograft vasculopathy@@@; and (9) demonstration of the effect of left ventricular assist devices to induce reverse remodeling, and the first randomized trial showing a survival benefit with ventricular assist devices.

citations.NLM: Packer M. The First Dedicated Comprehensive Heart Failure Program in the United States: The Division of Circulatory Physiology at Columbia Presbyterian (1992-2004). J Card Fail. 2023 Apr 17;():. PMID: 37075940
citations.BibTeX: @article{37075940, title={The First Dedicated Comprehensive Heart Failure Program in the United States: The Division of Circulatory Physiology at Columbia Presbyterian (1992-2004).}, author={Packer M}, journal={J Card Fail}}
